other_title: ドメスティックな彼女 (Japanese)
plot: High schooler Natsuo is hopelessly in love with his cheerful and popular teacher, Hina. However, one day at a mixer, he meets a moody girl by the name of Rui and ends up sleeping with her. Soon after, his father announces that he's getting remarried to a woman with two daughters of her own. And who shows up in tow, other than both Hina and Rui. (from manga)
insert_song: "Hakanai Kiss de Owarasete" (儚いキスで終わらせて) by Yōko Hikasa (ep 7)
